meanings.sent1: The magic trick mystifying the audience was truly amazing.
meanings.sent2: She found the complex riddle mystifying and couldn't solve it.
meanings.sent3: The way the cat tried to understand the disappearing toy was mystifyingly cute.
meanings.sent4: His ability to solve the puzzle so quickly mystified everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious disappearance of the key remained mystifying even after hours of searching.

meanings.sent1: The maze was mystifying, with its twisting paths and hidden doors.
meanings.sent2: The cryptic message on the old map was truly mystifying to the explorers.
meanings.sent3: The way the teacher explained the math problem was mystifyingly unclear.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious fog that covered the town was mystifying in its density.
meanings.sent5: The strange symbols on the ancient artifact remained mystifying to the archaeologists.
